description_localized.en: Designed for the comfort and convenience of a global business traveler, Measuring 41- 50 Sqm the Deluxe Room offer a relaxing ambiance with a comfortable King / Queen / Twin size bed and a spacious Living Area with comfortable seating and a Working Desk. The Suite can accommodate a maximum of two adults and two child with the existing bedding. Extra Bed is available on with an extra charge. Non-Smoking Rooms available.

The Suite can accommodate a maximum of two adults and two child with the existing bedding. Extra Bed is available on with an extra charge. Non-Smoking Rooms available.

images.caption: DELUXE ROOM
images.description: Designed for the comfort and convenience of a global business traveler, Measuring 41- 50 Sqm the Junior Suites offer a relaxing ambiance with a comfortable King / Queen / Twin size bed and a spacious Living Area with comfortable seating and a Working Desk. The Suite can accommodate a maximum of two adults and two child with the existing bedding. Extra Bed is available on with an extra charge. Non-Smoking Rooms available.
